author: Aaron Jue
description:
You'll get a custom EFF35 Challenge Coin when you become a monthly or annual Sustaining Donor by July 10. It’s that simple.

Give Once a Month

Give Once a YEar

Start a Convenient recurring donation Today!

But here's a little more background for all of you detail-oriented digital rights fans. EFF's 35th Anniversary celebration has begun and we're commemorating three and a half decades for fighting for your privacy, security, and free expression rights online. These values are hallmarks of freedom and necessities for true democracy, and you
title: A Token of Appreciation for Sustaining Donors 💞
